definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">bonemeal_used</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_logic_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesboolean">CUSTOM:Logsall</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">debug</field><value name="message"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="10"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="entity_name"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> use bonemeal on  ( </field></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="item_name"><value name="item"><block type="blockitem_to_mcitem"><value name="source"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> ) at </field></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> x : </field></block></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="ADD6"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> y : </field></block></value><value name="ADD7"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="ADD8"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> z : </field></block></value><value name="ADD9"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
